climbs.name: Smooth Operator
climbs.fa: Urmas Franosch, Matt Ciancio, Rick Ziegler 2006

content.description:
Looks like a very sustained slab face.

We did not try to climb it.
content.protection: Bolts to two-bolt anchor (perhaps with a ring?).
content.location:
Center of three bolted routes as of 2018, below tall slab.

2014 print guidebook by Marty Lewis has clear photo.

content.description:
Sustained thoughtful interesting moves.

If take the time to feel around carefully, can find holds with some positivity. Otherwise might seem mostly flat / slopy.

Follow the bolts roughty straight up.
content.protection: Bolts to two-bolt anchor (perhaps with a ring?).
content.location:
Left-most of three bolted routes as of 2018, up the hill from irregular right-facing corner.

2014 print guidebook by Marty Lewis has clear photo.

climbs.name: Action Figure (In Memory of Bruce Sato)

content.description:
Two crux sequences with feet on the gully surface, smoothed by occasional flows of water. Perhaps only 10c if you're tall or see the sequence quickly - (second is more tricky).

Scramble up some smoothness to reach the first bolt, then follow the bolts roughly up along the gully.
content.protection: Bolts to two-bolt anchor (perhaps with a ring?).
content.location:
Right-most of three bolted routes as of 2018, below a gully.

2014 print guidebook by Marty Lewis has clear photo.
